name: Agent Gone Fishing
description: A game project created by a group of friends, where I contributed by designing models. This game was developed alongside other projects using Unity.

name: Abielas Journey
description: Abiela's Journey is inspired by the game Journey, offering an emotional adventure through vast desert landscapes. It focuses on exploration, puzzle-solving, and connecting with other players in a shared, immersive world built with Unity.

name: Medieval Archer
description: Medieval Archer is a wave shooter game set in a medieval world, built with the Unity engine. Developed in 2018, it immerses players in defending against waves of enemies with archery skills.

name: Volvo Cars
description: During my internship at Volvo, I worked on developing a virtual reality experience for the Volvo 360C, an autonomous vehicle concept. The project involved using a fully equipped VR rig with headsets to simulate the experience of riding in the 360C, focusing on how passengers would feel in a self-driving car environment. Our goal was to make the experience as realistic as possible, capturing the sense of movement and comfort that the 360C aims to provide, while also exploring user interactions within an autonomous ride. Built using Unity.

name: Instant Systems AB
description: Worked on developing self-service machines, collaborating closely with a graphic designer to improve UI for RAZOR. Focused on enhancing the frontend of the machines to make them more user-friendly and efficient.

name: HEERO Sports GmbH
description:
My job as a Software Developer at HEERO Sports was diverse and multifaceted, involving a range of tasks from game development to API - Updated and stabilized 110 games, ensuring a stable version across the board using Unity.
- Developed APIs for the AIRIS platform and the in-progress dashboard using C#.
- Worked on the development of a mobile app for AIRIS using Flutter.
- Designed and implemented the database structure, including ERD, and created the necessary API endpoints for the platform.
- Utilized HTML, CSS, PHP, and JavaScript for front-end and back-end development in our Dashboard project.

name: Corpore-franchise.de
description: During my time at HEERO SPORTS, I created a webpage for Corpore Franchise using WordPress. I developed custom scripts to enhance functionality, ensuring a smooth user experience. The webpage was built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Mindflower AB
description: At Mindflower, my main focus was on the development of Prindit, a platform designed to enhance employee engagement and happiness by collecting responses to various questions. Through Prindit, companies can gain insights into improving their workplace environment. I primarily worked on developing features within Prindit's dashboard, but I also had the opportunity to create customer cases. Additionally, I developed a Flutter app to improve the user experience for our customers using Flutter.
